game.name: Cuisineer
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 귀염뽀짝하고 맛있는 로그라이트 풍의 던전 크롤러 게임임! 푸릇푸릇한 세계를 탐험하고 믿음직한 주걱과 보바티로 몬스터를 물리치고, 맛있는 재료를 가져와 레스토랑에서 요리하고 서빙하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A super cute and tasty roguelite-flavored dungeon crawler! Explore a lush world and defeat monsters with your trusty spatula and some boba tea, then gather delicious ingredients and bring them home to cook and serve at your restaurant!

reviewHighlights.text: Honestly at first I was mildly dissapointed by what I bought, BUT! that was simply due to me just starting out. The game quickly becomes fulfilling on...
Just shy of a reccommend. I love just about every aspect of this game but the combat so clunky. Which is NOT what you want with a game that makes you...
